Air pollution would significantly decrease as there would be fewer vehicles emitting harmful gases into the atmosphere. Confidence score: 0.8
Traffic congestion would decrease as bicycles can move more efficiently than cars in many areas, especially in urban areas. Confidence score: 0.9
Health benefits would increase as people would be more physically active and have less exposure to the negative health effects of car exhaust. Confidence score: 0.95

The economy would see a shift in industries, as the demand for car manufacturing and maintenance would decrease, while the demand for bike manufacturing and maintenance would increase. Confidence score: 0.85
